ProductInfo.Features:
This package price of $3,349 includes BeoPlay V1 Television, Beo4 Remote and a floor stand.  Other mounting solutions (table stand and wall bracket) sold separately.
BeoPlay V1 is a television that gives new meaning to the term 'flexibility'.
It features a unique industrial design that is made for the way you live and play; Superior sound to fit your content. The TV automatically adjusts the sound settings to perfect acoustics every time regardless of the media being used.
BeoPlay V1 works seamlessly with all of your other devices like your Blu-ray player, Apple TV, or game console.
Flexible placement options are available online.
ProductInfo.Name: BeoPlay V1-32
